issue.title: Running with Robotiq hands results in 20-50% slower simulation speed

content.raw: We are currently using a simplified version that has only a single joint per finger due to the simulation speed impact of the full Robotiq hand.  It is too painful for the sim to run 1/2 as fast when having to run with high iters for stability.
content.html: We are currently using a simplified version that has only a single joint per finger due to the simulation speed impact of the full Robotiq hand. It is too painful for the sim to run 1/2 as fast when having to run with high iters for stability.
